subject: Re: Frank's Box and Chris Moon
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I know, I was concerned too, but decided that maybe it's not up to me 
to say how this stuff is being used. To me, Moon is out there using the 
boxes in public, and that's how many find out about it, so he might as 
well have better stuff. 

 Frank-S


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Leah" <leahsodyssey@...> wrote:
>
> I am concerend because Chris Moon is using Frank's box under his name 
to make money.  He 
> charges $250 for a half hour session with this box.  I wouldn't be so 
irritated had he just 
> called it something else, but this is Frank's and it should be up to 
Frank how this box is used.  
> I think using it to make money is wrong.  I am not saying it would be 
wrong for Frank to 
> market it it, at a reasonable price, but to charge $250 for a session 
that is under the 
> interpretation of Chris Moon is just playing on those who are 
suffering from a loss and 
> looking for a connection.
>
